#summary Main features of the plugin
#labels Featured
= Current features =

  * Basic syntax coloring for als files
  * Compilation of Alloy4 files from Eclipse
  * Output on Eclipse console
  * Alloy project nature
  * Hyperlink to source code in case of errors

= Upcoming features =

  * Code format
  * Quick fix
  * Outline
  * Remembering last run (compilation or commands)
  * Visualization using Graphviz+Swing
  * Managing properties the Eclipse way
